body: It would've been fine if it was a steamy hot sex with our MC Goblin Slayer but no we've seen too many UB (ugly bastards)/goblins... and nope, sry Eba just missed the mark this time: lackluster sex scenes, even the original Cow Girl looks sexier than this version, and the addition of goblins... ah, give me a trash can so I can vomit in it. PS: is this Cow Girl a re-hash from a girl in recent series "Love Wheel"? Check out Anthurium 2022-01 and compare! Seriously...
Goblin slayer when he finds out what they did to her childhood friend: the Peace never are an option
Really needed some x-ray semen inflation at the end there.. looking at that huge goblin the climax just feels way too lackluster. Love Ebas art though.
牛乳娘の両親は他界してるだろ…
